column4: the only difference from server to desktop is the kernel installed, all the other packages are identical, just server puts a lot less stuff on the system by default
what is ur advice? do u think kernel will make a big trouble?
I doubt it, I run gui on a couple of my server installs, the kernel doesn't have much effect on the gui
if i wanna get server edition i must be professional with the commands?
if the kernel is a problem you can just install the regular version and reboot using it instead of the server kernel
but I have several servers, running the server kernel, with the gui working fine
